timeline.message:
CLDR-14180 Bill Pugh singletons

Multiple classes, notably:
- DBUtils: need special handling for test instances
- restructured SortMode subclasses some to reduce object creation

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't appear right. The key to the Bill Pugh singletons is that the statics are in their own static class. That keeps them from being created until needed.
timeline.author: macchiati

replies.bodyText: The SortMode subclasses are intertwined, many sibling classes make use of the Comparator instance from another sibling. But, I can make these lazily instantiated.
replies.author: srl295

timeline.bodyText: This looks better, except that each static should be in its own helper. Otherwise you create all of them when any one of them is created.
timeline.author: macchiati

replies.bodyText: The Comparator depends on the Collator.
replies.author: srl295

CLDR-14180 Bill Pugh singletons

Multiple classes, notably:
- DBUtils: need special handling for test instances
- restructured SortMode subclasses to reduce object creation
- CLDRConfig: needs special handling per environment
- deprecated CLDRConfig.getStandardCodes() - just use StandardCodes.make()

CLDR-14180 Bill Pugh singletons

Multiple classes, notably:
- DBUtils: need special handling for test instances
- restructured SortMode subclasses to reduce object creation
- CLDRConfig: needs special handling per environment
- deprecated CLDRConfig.getStandardCodes() - just use StandardCodes.make()

CLDR-14180 Bill Pugh singletons

Multiple classes, notably:
- DBUtils: need special handling for test instances
- restructured SortMode subclasses to reduce object creation
- CLDRConfig: note special handling per environment. Many getter functions
already were practically static in semantics, but the API is retained as
non-static. Added some documentation.
- deprecated CLDRConfig.getStandardCodes(), as callers should use StandardCodes.make()

CLDR-14180 Bill Pugh singletons

Multiple classes, notably:
- DBUtils: need special handling for test instances
- restructured SortMode subclasses to reduce object creation
- CLDRConfig: note special handling per environment. Many getter functions
already were practically static in semantics, but the API is retained as
non-static. Added some documentation.
- deprecated CLDRConfig.getStandardCodes(), as callers should use StandardCodes.make()
